meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4, including futures, distributed tracing, reactive database clients, SQL templating, and more.

meta.title: Migrate from Vert.x 3 to Vert.x 4
meta.summary: We provide a clear and well-documented migration path from Vert.x 3.9 to Vert.x 4. Existing users will feel at home with the new version.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.6 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.6 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.
